website_summaries.verdict: This 3.7 quart air fryer from GoWISE is the perfect size to feed between 2 and 4 people.
pros: Includes presets for popular fried foods
Cooking timer for up to 30 minutes
Temperature control from 180 to 400 degrees Fahrenheit
Perfect for a family of 2-4 people
cons: Non-stick coating can peel over time
To help prevent it, wash gently by hand, not using any abrasive scrubbers

website_summaries.verdict: Cook healthier by air frying your favorite food items.
pros: This Air Fryer gives you the option of frying, grilling, roasting, or baking lunch or dinner
Detachable basket and pan are dishwasher safe
Features a cooking timer up to 30 minutes, and eight cooking pre-sets
Ready to be used immediately out of the box
cons: The heating element has caused issues for multiple users

customer_reviews.title: Issue with paint pealing
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with the air fryer but have an issue with the paint pealing from the pan. I purchased February 2015 and the paint started pealing after the second use. GoWISE should be aware of the problem as others have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bistro89

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this almost everyday for the last two weeks and I love it. I put aluminum foil in the basket to catch all the crumbs and I use a spray bottle to spray oil oilve on the basket. My eggs rolls and squid came out crunchy. I tried to do funnel cake but that didn't work out. The only drawback is when you completely remove the basket to shake your food, the timer reset so what I do is just open the drawer enough for me to flip my food and close it so the timer doesn't reset.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: We owned this air fryer for under 2 years, and only used a handfull of times. About 6 months ago (A little over a year old) I thought it wasn't heating up correctly, but it did still cook the food. I tried to use it this weekend for the first time since then and the fryer won't even warm up. Does not last. It was nice for the first year when it worked though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: Must have! You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!! It cooks food amazingly. I put tator tots in it and they come out like they have been deep fried, crispy and brown in like 16 mins. Everything I have cooked in it so far has turned out amazing. Sometimes you can’t believe all the bad reviews. I love it and now I can’t live without it. I will say it’s much larger than I thought it would be. The basket is about the same size as a fry-daddy basket.
customer_reviews.author: sjtoal99

customer_reviews.title: This product is a fire hazard. I bought two ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fire hazard. I bought two this past november both fryers caught fire from electrical cords. I would avoid buying this product at all cost. And the seller refused to give me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: rozelia souza

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air fryer via the Amazon Warehouse deals. When I received it everything looked good. I used it a few times and noticed the coating started chipping off. Now, it's more than half chipped off and I cannot use it as I have no idea how dangerous this coating is. DO NOT BUY THIS Product. I love air-frying and will be purchasing a new air fryer from a better manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: jlk-houston

customer_reviews.title: Ok so i love the air fryer it has your food fried but ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so i love the air fryer it has your food fried but in a healthy way you don’t need much oil if any the only problem i have is that we have had the air fryer for 3 weeks and it cracked we have not dropped it haven’t put it in water while it’s hot i always let it cool so with that being said i like it for what it does but would probably have to go with something different due to the product cracking on the basket
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene Laseter

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. Some reviews stated it was noisy, but I didn't find it so. We tried making chicken wings several different ways and they all were tasty and they did get crispy. We thought it would be good for making potato chips, but in order to get them crispy they have been burning. Still experimenting with that. It would have been helpful to have more recipes included as this will be most peoples first purchase of an air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shore

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to determine correct settings.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to determine correct settings. The 8 presets didn't match anything I wanted to cook. If you need to open to turn the food it resets the temp and time and you have to re-enter. I only found 7 items that I would regularly cook and they were all frozen. I use it mostly for frozen steak fries and frozen biscuit dough. If I bought another one I wouldn't get the digital model. Buy the less expensive rotary dial model.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid Lover

customer_reviews.title: Most useful
customer_reviews.text: One of the most useful appliances in years. I use it almost everyday. There is no end to the things it is good for, and well worth the counter space it takes up. You can put a week old croissant in it and it will come out like fresh from the bakery. Tried cooking some eggs, although they tasted OK, they were nearly impossible to peel. Not sure what would happen if you placed the eggs in a cup of water. Like hash browns? They're fantastic....without all of the splattered grease!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: teflon peeling
customer_reviews.text: After just a few uses (and very careful, gentle cleaning) the teflon coating on the basket was flaking off and attaching itself to my food. Of course I can't eat THAT! I only gave it 2 stars because it works well, other than trying to poison you. I thought of putting down parchment or foil, which would make the basket basically useless for the oil to drip away. I will start putting a rack in it, but why should I have to go through the effort? I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Trying lots of new air fryer recipes!
customer_reviews.text: We love using our air fryer. It works great for bacon, veggies, hamburgers, sweet potato fries and more! We are always trying new recipes. We just did our pumpkin seeds in it after carving pumpkins. The seeds came out much better than doing them in the oven. The only thing I'm not crazy about is cleaning the pan. Even though I spray it with oil some things still stick a little and I have to really soak and scrub to get the food off the pan. Other than that it's easy to use and is a healthier way to fry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 Years of Air Fried Bliss
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic while it lasted. I purchased this 2 1/2 years ago and it has been through hundreds of potatoes. Unfortunately today it decided to stop connecting properly when I slide in the basket. I can pull it out a little bit to make the connection but if I let go it doesn't register that the basket is there. So it's dead :( Although it was used hard it shouldn't have died like this after only 2 1/2 years since it cost double what they're selling for now. That's why it only receives 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Technochick

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We loved this item at first. The food turned out great. We only used it about 6 times and then it stopped working. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Gr8 product.. easy to use .. we zeroed on this one after doing lot of research, and we r v happy with this purchase.. ideal for serving size of 3-4 .. meat tenders, chips, tandoors r our favs amongst all what we tried.. i do not use oil which is why i feel its best & healthier addition to my kitchen..
customer_reviews.author: Gauri

customer_reviews.title: I love this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer. I am able to eat great fried food (french fries!) without the excess oil or waiting for the foods to cook in the oven. Best 'gadget' that I have purchased by far. This Air Fryer gets used several times a week, many of my (gadgets) appliances sit on the counter, rarely being used and collecting dust. It's easy to use and clean up is a snap. A great buy for anyone who loves fried foods and have a desire to eat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Cronicle A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Basket is junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this AF here a few years ago. The basket has paint chips all over it. Rather than spend $42+ for a new basket that will also chip, I'm tossing this one and buying an air fryer with a ceramic basket. I liked this air fryer, we cook steaks, chops, wings, fries, brats, everything in it but we're not heavy users and had to start using a rack and/or parchment paper in it due to the paint chips over a year ago. The first year, we used it 2-3 times only so it's not been heavily used. Also the low wattage made it hard to follow recipes from air fryer groups where the norm seems to be 1700-1800 watts.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Cook

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stop even when timer is off for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Worst appliance ever. I cooked few items. Display was always on with some 10 minutes setting and temperature. I adjusted for each cooking item but whenever the food is done and timer beeps, it didn't stopped. I had to pull out the plug each time to stop it. And youcan only cook for one person. I tried cooking for us a family of 3. Food still remains uncooked and partially cooked even after the time
customer_reviews.author: heer

customer_reviews.title: OK - but really didn't offer anything more than using my own Kitchen Oven
customer_reviews.text: I guess this was an impulse buy. I saw this on another website for a much more expensive price. But when I got it, it really didn't offer me anything more than my traditional oven. I think had I not been a quasi chefette, I would have kept it. I think this would be good for single person who doesn't want to mess up kitchen oven to cook, but this model as far as I could tell, did not offer any faster cooking than regular oven, especially when you have to do small batches. Not mentioning the fact that these things do take up a lot of counter space. Just not the tool for me.
customer_reviews.author: KatCanDu

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer with only one issue.
customer_reviews.text: We got our air fryer about 1 1/2 months ago. We really like it. The only issue is the fryer basket. Even though we’ve only used it a few times and were careful with washing it, the Teflon on the air fryer basket has already started coming off. If you get this fryer, I would recommend buying the precut round parchment paper to line the basket. It will make cleaning easier and protect the Teflon in the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Hien Cao

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying cooking and experimenting with this fryer. I do think that the beep for the settings is very very loud and annoying and there is no way to adjust it. I made panko coated chicken breasts and they were incredible. Moist and tender. It does take some trial and error to figure out the correct cooking time. It is very easy to clean and I recommend using parchment paper in the pan when using any kind of breading. Does not heat up the kitchen when cooking which comes in handy on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: CWBRI

customer_reviews.title: It's a good air fryer...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this, but I ended up returning this item. It might just be me, but I don't understand why everyone has been raving about air fryers. My toaster oven does many of the same things and is easier to use. I'm giving it 4 stars bc the item itself is good, so there's no reason to take points off just bc I prefer my toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula K.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea that works if you can get replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: It works & works well. Programming controls are easy to operate they too deliver what's offered. It operates quietly and NOT heat up rooms. I edited my review as after using it a couple of months, I had need to replace the basket (my fault, the base melted). To this day, I'm unable to get a replacement basket. It is no longer under warranty and I'm willing to pay for it. They have replacement baskets for the XL model but not for the smaller model I purchased. This is really frustrating. If and when I get the replacement part, I will be happy to review it again.
customer_reviews.author: 9Toes

customer_reviews.title: Burned itself out.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it while it worked. Just short of a year, it overheated. No display now, so it's dead. 😞 Not sure I'll buy this brand again. Also had a GoWise electric pressure cooker that died immediately.
customer_reviews.author: vickey

customer_reviews.title: Buy a warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this comes with a year warranty. Mine did a great job for a year and two months. The end. I started it up to preheat and all of the sudden it quit. The lights were still on and it allowed me to reprogram and hit start. It worked for about 5 seconds and then totally shut down. I've tried everything to get it to start, even trying different electrical outlets and readjusting the basket to make sure it's in correctly. Nothing! Loved it when it worked. Other people of made the same complaint. You might want to do more extensive research or make sure to buy an extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Good way to cook
customer_reviews.text: This Air Fryer Is a great way to give food that fried flavor without using oil. I have fried chicken, pork steaks, pork chops Ground beef and have roasted vegetables in this since I got it. I have also made frozen french fries and onion rings with this, everything I have tried so far has been very tasty, just like frying in a deep fryer or roasting in an oven.
customer_reviews.author: The Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience So Far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We have only used the fryer once but it was perfect. We made fried chicken thighs with a recipe from the book modified with tips from the internet. The chicken was crispy and moist. The thigh pieces were fairly large so I only cooked two at a time, but it's just me & the hubby so four was the goal. in only 18 minutes with one turn they were perfect with NO oil. Clean up was super easy. So glad to not have a pot of icky oil to deal with or splatters all over the stove when done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome we live this appliance We do not use oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome we live this appliance We do not use oil when cooking and now have the crispy crunch without the oil We had to buy the additional cookware pans rack etc but well worth it Like the fact that it is on the counter ergonomic for the back and emits minimal heat when cooking We live in AZ and not having to heat up the kitchen with oven is an extra bonus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who don’t cook much
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Bought it for a gift for my dad who doesn’t cook and he uses it a few times a week. He cooks chicken in it mostly, but has also done kale chips. Straight forward to use, easy to clean (hand wash to prolong the life). So far, super happy with the ease of use and consistently well cooked food.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Basket problem
customer_reviews.text: In only 5 month terrible material and the replacement is very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Luis Daniel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and I’ve ended up using it just as much as him! It’s not just for frying things, as I thought before I’d looked into them. I made the best salmon I’ve ever eaten in under 15 minutes with easy cleanup. You can’t beat the price and quality on this machine. We’re using it for 3/4 meals. Highly recommend and get the accessories kit too so you can bake and do all inclusive meals.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom about maybe 4 or so years ago now. It gets used all of the and works great. No issues whatsoever since it has been bought
customer_reviews.author: Tatum Borders

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this thing is huge! Takes up way too much counter space. It’s says on box no preheating but every recipe calls for preheating! Actually takes more time than frying and the taste is weird and the food is dry. Product was cheaply made and I had to wiggle the basket to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: the paint coming off and strated rusting
customer_reviews.text: after a year of use about 2ice a week the paint inside is coming off and I see rust starting in it, very cheap will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lord lover

customer_reviews.title: Great food, faulty product
customer_reviews.text: It makes wonderful food, but I have to keep the door closed with a bungy chord. I waited too long to return the faulty product and I was forced to give it away to someone that did not mind using a bungy chord to keep the door closed and engaged for it to cook. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Strange

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a very nice air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using my air fryer and am trying different tasty recipes. I think it takes some practice to perfect the new recipes I am trying. This was an excellent price for this air fryer and it is large enough to cook items for three people. I am pleased with my purchase; but like I said I am still practicing.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly "deep fried" but thats the point right? Lost 1 star due to no way to layer foods (wings specifically) have to shake every 5 mins or so to keep even browning, or cook multiple batches. Perhaps I can find something use for this. Does fries perfectly, in fact, everthing I've cooked has turned out pretty good. I have been having to keep an eye on foods to get used to times and temps.
customer_reviews.author: P Foster

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm updating my review to exclude the delivery problem. The air fryer worked great the first time and the 5 or 6 times after that. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out for me
customer_reviews.text: Tried potatoes and chops. Cooking time took much longer than stated. Food was dry. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sage M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: For months I was putting off getting an air fryer, but because I don't like to cook with grease this was perfect for my family. I wouldn't recommend following the recipes in the cookbook though. I tried and ended up putting the food on several cycles.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have had for quite a while now. I just purchased a new 8 in 1 air fryer, dehydrator, convection oven and I’m passing this one down to our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: sartor

customer_reviews.title: Love this airfryer!
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is superb! We really didn't know what to expect, but thought we would take a chance on this air fryer. We have been thrilled! We use it for healthy french fries weekly as well as for many other foods. It is the perfect size for food for 2.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my air fryer. Only thing is in the cooker the bottom portion some of the enamel came off and the same on the basket that fit the inside. Other than that, I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: The #1  Queen of Purple

customer_reviews.title: Great for eggs, wings, fries
customer_reviews.text: This sits on the counter and is used every day so far. Great for boiled eggs! Set for 16 min for 250. Go for a walk and we have eggs that peal easily after a quick ice bath. Great for wings and fries. Waiting to see how this holds up for a year.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this airfryer. I keep looking for new things to try in it. I’ve made wings, chips, mozzarella sticks, bacon, stuffed peppers . . . You name it. Super easy to use and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its my new toy! I have tried everything I can think of. My only complaint is that it doesn't cook whole chickens thoroughly. Its great for smaller chicken pieces but not the whole chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie R. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: No turn on and broken in 5 areas.  The cost for return its expensive.  What we do?
customer_reviews.text: Broken in 5 areas. For return i need to pay the shipping cost and its $43.23 the most economy. The package are broken and the equipment its not working.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this appliance! It makes the perfect fried chicken strips and fries! Can't believe how often I use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richardson

customer_reviews.title: This is basically a micro convection oven for a single ...
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a micro convection oven for a single person you can cook meat and potatoes for one in it very quickly. Store frozen fried chicken ff and onion rings work well broiling steak chicken and fish got dried out if cooked until done.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: AND I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. THERE IS NO DIFFERENCE BETWEEN IT AND ...
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE BEEN USING THIS AIR FRYER FOR MORE THAN A YEAR NOW, AND I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. THERE IS NO DIFFERENCE BETWEEN IT AND THE EXPENSIVE PHILIPS AIR FRYER JUST THE PRICE. WORK WELL AND YOU DONT NEED TO USE OIL. THE BAN HAS HOLES TO DRAIN ANY WATER OR OIL . IT IS AMAZING TO COOK, FRY, OR HEAT FOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Alhubail

customer_reviews.title: So far so good/ love this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using this air fryer. Makes having "fries and wedges" so much easier. One thing that I noticed is that it does not get up to 400 degrees as advertised!!!! Not sure why but it stops at 392 degrees. Edit I use this every day and it has been a blessing . No oven to heat up the kitchen. Food comes out crispy and evenly cooked. Have recommended this to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device Easy to use. My wife adores her. I had problems with the shipment and the buyer responded quickly replacing and packing another equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Penaloza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Love my air fryer!!! It’s perfect for fast, convenient meals. Soooo easy to use and clean up is a snap. Although it is dishwasher safe, I wash it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Moore

customer_reviews.title: This Air Fryer is Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing for $65! I read the reviews and people complaining about the basket flaking... what do you expect for $65? I bought the warranty for $7 to take care of that just in case and it beats paying $299 for a Phillips model. So stop complaining about the $65 and be grateful! I love my air fryer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't use the air fryer yet but I know co workers who have one and they love it and I wanted it to use instead of frying on top of my stove and getting crease all over the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Faye R Brown

customer_reviews.title: Healthier Cooking 100%
customer_reviews.text: Best air fryer great concept. Fry your foods with little to no oils. French fries taste great! I cook everything in it. Through trial and error I've learned how to cook using an air fryer and it's much healthier cooking!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it lasted. Purchased 6/23/17 and completely stopped working 11/5/17. Didn’t even last 5 months. Buy an air fryer but just not this one!
customer_reviews.author: judith

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, two were gifts. Used mine to try it out when I first got it and haven’t used it since. Worked great for the few things I tried in it.
customer_reviews.author: mcv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I love love my air fryer. I never friend foods cause I hated the grease and the Oil splatter. And its really not good for you. But this works great at making things crunchy
customer_reviews.author: Carrie W

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Omg..... I think this is the best think I have bought in a long time that I enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Quiles

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick black coating starting to peel off
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use much the first few months after purchasing. After I starter using it more the non-stick coating started to peel off. Now the food is sticking. Would not recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Smart Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: This product was more than expected for the price. It is really up to date. I bought it for a gift and my friend loves it. If I did not already have one' I would purchase it for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: The basket and bins are easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for over a month now and have been using it everyday, with no issues. On board dials and buttons are very user friendly. The basket and bins are easy to clean. This is my favorite appliance to use around my house.
customer_reviews.author: EZPZ

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever!!!! My kid loves wings and french fries; I don't mind making them I just hate; 1 giving him all that oily food, 2 the waste of all that oil because I refuse to reuse, 3 the burns oh my god the grease burns lol but with this the boy has been able to eat his chicken wings and fries and I don't even feel bad that it's his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Mrz. Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great product with sleek design. Over all very easy to use and comes with an inrkmative pamphlet with cooking advice. I took away one star because the machine came cosmetically damaged. Multiple skratches and scuffs. Seemed like it may have been a return they resold.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Van Eck

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Better than heating oven up
customer_reviews.text: Learning curve. Turn temp.down, shorter time. Burned food following book. Works great. Better than heating oven up. Shorter time to cook. Very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: deer hunter

customer_reviews.title: So far I love this Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this Air Fryer. What I don't get is that it will say to cook at 350 degrees, but my setting will only go to 347 degrees, and the next click up goes to 356 degrees. Also, I can't seem to master French fries. They are only ok....and I LOVE fries--so this was disappointment. Chicken legs are awesome in this!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Kyllonen

customer_reviews.title: It cooks and it browns but I could not get it to feel or taste like food was fried
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it and it does air cook and it does give the appearance of frying but it does not taste like it was fried. I could not get potatoes to crisp or crunch and the taste is very different as well. I did not try meat or fish. It is a healthier way to cook but if you want the fried flavor, I'm not sure you will be happy with any of these air cookers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to cook different things have been making pork roasts perfect can cook a steak in 15 minutes perfectly frozen ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive been learning more how to use it and finding the right amount of time to cook different things have been making pork roasts perfect can cook a steak in 15 minutes perfectly frozen solid to start..Ive made tacos and pizza all came out really good just need to learn the time and tempature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MACHINE!
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday! This is the best addition to my kitchen I have made for low fat cooking and still get the crunch as you would if you were to fry in oil. Don't get me wrong, nothing can ever compare to fried chicken in a vat of hot oil but this runs a close second! Good for cooking for two or three people.
customer_reviews.author: AmyBeers

customer_reviews.title: Not so satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on June 8 and got to me right away no problems there, product was great at first but then I Started to notice the done buzzer sounding weird product still working then I also started to notice spots on the base inside of unit, paint was peeling off so now I have rust spots on the inside of the base( pull out part ) product still works good. You will also need to spray cooking oil type spray on the bottom of basket because everything will stick to it
customer_reviews.author: Gennie Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it, finding more and more recipes as I go along. Nice and quiet unit, with plenty of tray space and features. Once I get better at the proper techniques, I'll use it more often.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Kriehn

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for throwing the kid's frozen easy meals in (chicken ...
customer_reviews.text: This little machine gets used constantly. It is perfect for throwing the kid's frozen easy meals in (chicken nuggets and fish sticks) and it makes THE BEST grilled cheese creation. My favorite is buttering the bread, adding meats and cheeses and veggies and setting on the low setting for 10 minutes. Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. I also bought the bigger one for my other daughter with a bigger family

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it for so many things. My only complaint is the coating of the basket is starting to come off on the inside.

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift yet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was a Christmas gift and I have used it almost every day since. Food is delicious, clean up is easy and the product is of high quality and is well made.. I'm going to buy another one so I will have two and can cook multiple dishes simutaneously.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my aunt. She loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my aunt. She loves it. Beings though she can't have foods fried in oil due to her heart, it allows her to still have her fried foods.

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy buyer...great air frier.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 1 month non-stop....and it has performed perfextly well, cooks great, fast, reliable and much healthier . The only thing I do not like is rhe display stays on unless you unplug it ... eve n thiugh it dims. Would buy ot again.

customer_reviews.title: Love this wonderful cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love this wonderful cooker. I haven't used my stove since I got it. Food comes out perfect almost every time, some of the cooking guide timing kind of too long or not long enough, so, I learn to cook shorter time and check in between. I am buying another one, so I can cook 2 things at once. Hopefully, I don't need to buy the 3rd one, lol!

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this and Have not been disappointed. The food is a little different in taste ...

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and easy clean up

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean

customer_reviews.text: Makes mozzarella sticks great, chicken was very dry, french fries weren't very good. Not sure if it was this particular fryer. Wasn't very happy waste of space on counter. A convection oven does same thing.

product_meta.title: GoWISE USA 3.7-Quart Programmable 8-in-1 Air Fryer, GW22611
product_meta.description: This GoWISE USA Electric Air Fryer is a new, healthy and easy way to fry food. It uses a Rapid Air Circulating System to cook food. It works by circulating hot air in all directions around the ingredients. This Air Fryer gives you the option of frying, grilling, roasting, or baking your favorite foods. You can prepare anything from cakes to crispy French fries. It comes with a removable pan with a cool-to-touch handgrip and detachable basket to make it easy to transfer food from the fryer to a serving dish. They are also dishwasher safe. This Electric Air Fryer features temperature control from 176⁰F - 392⁰F, a cooking timer up to 30 minutes, and 8 different cooking pre-sets : "Warm-Up", "Chips", "Chicken", "Steak", "Shrimp", "Meat", "Cake", & "Fish". Safety features include overheat protection, automatic switch off, and automatic standby mode. The GoWISE USA Air Fryer is ETL certified and complies with all standards regarding Electro-Magnetic fields. If you have any questions regarding the Air Fryer and it's operation, contact the GoWISE USA customer service.
feature_bullets: Air Fry your favorite foods with little to no oil. The rapid air technology lets you air fry your favorite fried foods with little to no oil. Create healthier versions of your favorite foods with this Gowise USA air fryer.
3.7 QT capacity. This size is perfect for families with 2 - 4 people.

This air fryer comes with 8 presets designed to help make your life a little easier. 8 cooking presets: Warm-Up, Chips, Chicken, Steak, Meat, Cake, and Fish. Healthy and Easy way to fry food; Uses Rapid Air Circulation
If you'd rather set your own time and temperature, don't worry we have functions for that. Cooking timer up to 30 Minutes; temperature control from 180F - 400F.
Includes Recipe Book, which is filled with 50 recipes made specifically for (and with) the GoWISE USA air fryer. Recipes are for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and dessert.
